plot_inner¶

StaticMap.plot_inner()¶

Plot the inner borders for given countries.

This method reads the elements in the attribute inner_borders and plots the internal regional borders for each element on that list. Data for the borders is retrieved from the natural earth dataset http://www.naturalearthdata.com/.
